functional_roles.name: Protagonist
functional_roles.description: Central character whose journey drives the plot.

functional_roles.name: Antagonist
functional_roles.description: Opposes the protagonist; creates conflict and tension.

functional_roles.name: Deuteragonist
functional_roles.description: Second most important character; often ally or rival to protagonist.

functional_roles.name: Tritagonist
functional_roles.description: Third-tier character; may offer support, contrast, or narrative depth.

functional_roles.name: Foil
functional_roles.description: Highlights traits of another character through contrast.

functional_roles.name: Supporting Character
functional_roles.description: Adds richness and helps progress the story; friends, sidekicks, mentors, etc.

functional_roles.name: Confidant(e)
functional_roles.description: Trusted character with whom the protagonist shares secrets.

functional_roles.name: Narrator
functional_roles.description: Tells the story; may be involved or external to action.

functional_roles.name: Love Interest
functional_roles.description: Romantic counterpart that impacts emotional stakes.

functional_roles.name: Comic Relief
functional_roles.description: Injects humor and alleviates tension.

functional_roles.name: Mentor
functional_roles.description: Guides the protagonist with wisdom or skills.

functional_roles.name: Sidekick
functional_roles.description: Loyal companion who supports the protagonist's quest.

functional_roles.name: Guardian / Gatekeeper
functional_roles.description: Controls access to information or thresholds in the story.

functional_roles.name: Herald
functional_roles.description: Signals change or calls the protagonist to action.

functional_roles.name: Shapeshifter
functional_roles.description: Ambiguous or unstable allegiance; may switch sides.

functional_roles.name: Tempter / Temptress
functional_roles.description: Entices the protagonist toward distraction or destruction.

functional_roles.name: Trickster
functional_roles.description: Mischievous and unpredictable, often disrupting order.

functional_roles.name: Villain
functional_roles.description: Principal antagonist with malicious intent or opposing goals.

functional_roles.name: Anti-Hero
functional_roles.description: Flawed protagonist lacking traditional heroic qualities.

functional_roles.name: Everyman
functional_roles.description: Relatable character who represents the ordinary person.
